thread.title: Braggs' goal gives Cats win over Valley
thread.title_full: Braggs' goal gives Cats win over Valley

author:
Debbie Holmes 

Trail-Gazette
title: Braggs' goal gives Cats win over Valley
text:
Braggs' goal gives Cats win over Valley By Debbie Holmes Posted: 09/30/2015 08:58:28 AM MDT Estes Park's Tanner Stark gets set to boot the ball. ( Photos courtesy of Renee Tomasula ) 
The high school Bobcat soccer team traveled to Gilcrest on Thursday, Sept. 24 to play Valley, and the Cats brought home another win, beating the Vikings 1-0, with a goal scored by Cannon Braggs. 
Amos Westley recorded six saves and aided in the victory. 
Estes Park finds itself with a 3-2 league record and temporarily tops the Class 3A Region 4 soccer standings. 
The Cats are 4-5 overall for their season. As the team gears up for the last six games of the 2015 season, the Bobcats hope to stay healthy, strong and near the top of the league standings. 
The Cats have a much needed rest this week, with their only game being against Sterling on Saturday at 2 pm. The Cats will host Sterling and take advantage of being on their home turf looking to reverse the outcome from their first game against the Tigers, where Sterling won 4-1. Advertisement Koy Maynatt leaps for a header during last Thursday's game at Valley. The Bobcats were victorious, winning 1-0. ( Photos courtesy of Renee Tomasula )
